column1: Baby Barnaby's////There are some places where the food is SO good you HAVE to leave a review while still in the location. THIS is one of those places!! As everyone states the service was ALMOST as good as the food!!! I got French toast sausage and eggs and everything was amazing everything tasted top notch!!! My fianc√© got the waffle
column3: and bacon and just the same! TOP NOTCH!! We will be returning customers for sure! Please give this place a try. ONLY negative was orange juice
column4: it get peeled in the machine but you can tell the orange peel "juice" gets in there slightly
column5: it's not terrible but if you're expecting like store orange juice you may be disappointed!!
